title: Referendum against reduction of hiking trails
wording: Hiking trails are a cultural asset. The planned reduction in trail maintenance should be stopped. Hikers demand that all existing trails continue to be maintained.

title: Initiative for accessible internet (Access initiative)
wording: Websites of authorities as well as publicly supported or subsidized actors should be accessible without barriers. All people should be able to use information and services.

title: For more shaded spaces in public areas (Sun protection initiative)
wording: Additional trees and canopies should be created in public spaces. This makes hot days more bearable for children, seniors and everyone who is outdoors.

title: Initiative for affordable housing in Zurich
wording: More affordable housing must be created in Canton Zurich. At least 30% of all new housing must be public utility housing.

title: Referendum against reduction of public transport
wording: The planned reduction of public transport connections in rural areas must be prevented. All regions must remain well served.
